trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Margate
There were no other sightings in Margate on or around October 11th 2002
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my front porch.I was looking to the east when the object appeared fromthe N.W. over my neighbors house.It traveled to the S.E. and out of view behinda large tree where I lost sight of it.I called my son who was inside and toldhim about it. My reaction was kind of like shock.You know like,what the hell wasthat.The object moved in a straight line at app.200 mph.I am a U.S.Navyvet.Having been a helicopter mech.I live in the flight path of Ft.LauderdaleExecutive Airport,and am familiar with all the civilian aircraft that go in andout there.In daylight and at night I am familiar with these planes.Also thereare not many foreign,and no U.S.military aircraft that I cant identify.Thisobject had no sound at all.I am just puzzled as to what it might havebeen.Thanks for your time.Sincerly,Dennis Underwood
